name: Ouside My Window Demo
description:
This is a small indie horror/mystery game. You play as a small child who has just moved into his new home, sight unseen. At night he is plagued by thuds and by day the feeling he is being watched. He decides to investigate the noise one night, and finds himself face to face with, well you'll just have to see for yourself.

Game Notes:

This is just the first night, there will be more to come.

We have worked long and hard on this demo so please, enjoy!

To find the controls they are in the options menu.

Oh and it's probably worth mentioning that to use or place an item, you must drop it using the Q key.

Also, please tell me what you think! I would love to hear your feedback on how to improve the game. Leave a comment here or message me on Twitter @IndieSmall

The link to the page is https://twitter.com/IndieSmall


If you find any bugs let us know :)
